import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const ListOfBook = ({ shelf, listBook }) => { return (

MyReads

{shelf}

    {listBook .filter( (b) => b.shelf.trim().toLowerCase === shelf.trim().toLowerCase ) .map((book) => (
  1. {book.title}
    {book.authors}
    2. ))}

Want to Read

  1. 1776
    David McCullough
  2. Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
    J.K. Rowling

Read

  1. The Hobbit
    J.R.R. Tolkien
  2. Oh, the Places You'll Go!
    Seuss
  3. The Adventures of Tom Sawyer
    Mark Twain
Add
); }; export default ListOfBook;
